name: RevMeina
description: Simply a merger between RevAnimated v1.2.2 and MeinaPastel V4 that I tried to experiment with for my group of friends (sup /WWA/?). It probably wont be updated as I have no idea what i'm doing when it comes to this sort of thing, and I take ZERO credit for this beyond mashing two existing models together. No VAE needed.
